齵字的基本解释

齵
yú
牙齿不整齐。
泛指参差不齐：“察其菑蚤不齵，则轮虽敝不匡。”

齵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［óu］
［《廣韻》五婁切，平侯，疑。］
［《廣韻》遇俱切，平虞，疑。］
(1)牙齿不正。
(2)参差不齐。
(3)不契合。

齵字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【齒字部】　齵； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1535第12
【庸韻】五婁切【集韻】【正韻】魚侯切，?音嵎。【說文】齒不正也。【正韻】齒相佹也。　又【周禮·冬官考工記】察其葘蚤不齵，則輪?敝不匡。【註】葘輻之入轂處，蚤入牙處，齒牙參差，謂之齵。上下入處，整然相當，則轂?敝壞，輻不邪枉也。又【荀子·君道篇】境內之事，有弛易齵差者矣。　又【廣韻】遇俱切【集韻】【韻會】元俱切，?音虞。【廣韻】齱齵，齒重生。　又【正韻】一曰齒偏。

齵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
齵字的起名意思

暂无。

齵
Basic explanation of words
齵
yú
The teeth are irregular.
It generally refers to the unevenness: "If you observe that the fleas are not ridiculous, then the wheel will not be swayed."
齵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [óu]
["Guangyun" Five Louqie, Pinghou, Doubt. ]
["Guangyun" meets all cuts, pingyu, and suspicion. ]
(1) The teeth are not right.
(2) Uneven.
(3) Does not fit.
齵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haijixia】【tooth character department】　齵; Kangxi strokes: 24; page number: page 1535-12
[Yong Yun] Five Lou Qi [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Yuhou cut,? Yinhao. [Said the text] The teeth are not right. [Zheng Yun] The teeth are different.　[Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] If you check if the fleas are not runny, then you will take turns? [Note] The point at which the spokes enter the hub, where the fleas enter the teeth, and the teeth are ragged, which is called stubbornness. The upper and lower entrances are exactly the same, but the hub is broken, and it is worthwhile to say nothing. Also [Xunzi·Jundao Chapter] There are things in the territory, and there are people who are easy to be bad.　[Guangyun] Yu Juqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yuan Juqie,? Yinyu. [Guang Yun] The teeth are reborn.　[Zheng Yun] One said the teeth are off.
齵

Old glyph
齵
Name meaning
Nothing.
yú, óu
I сущ.
неровные (кривые) зубы
II прил.
неровный, неправильный, асимметричный
察其菑蚤不齵 проверить спицы для втулки, чтобы не было неровных
